May 12, 1913 D Southern Counties Association Contest (1st Section)
Southern Counties Association Contest (1st Section) 8 Test Piece Contest Southern Counties Association Contest southern-counties-association-contest-1st-section
None
Maritana [arr. Round]
The Grange, Crowborough Prizes: £7, £6, £4 10s, £3 March: 1. Horsham, 2. Sutton. 6 bands competed.
Nov. 28, 2013, 7:52 p.m. Sept. 30, 2018, 9:38 a.m.
1 West Crawley A. Williams
2 Horsham Borough John Thomas Ogden
3 Sutton Red Cross W. Gill
4 Reigate Town George Byford
5 Copthorne Silver Band W. J. Coverley
6 Reading Spring Gardens Brass Band J. Hodges
